A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Felt less manicured and controlled than other recent Star Wars films. Minus some of the cutesy animal stuff\, I loved this movie. It surprised me\, and left me looking forward to the ending. This is not a retread of Empire Strikes back\, and i liked seeing the characters dealing with consequences- those of their actions and the actions of others. To me\, this field had character- a certain “salt”iness ;)
